text.text: MumaraESP offers smooth integration of a PowerMTA mail server, best known not only for the high volume email delivery, but also for its ability to customize the sending infrastructure for optimized delivery. The process would take you few simple steps to securely connect to your PowerMTA based mail server. If the email volumes grow more than the capacity of one sending server, you can conveniently add more by following the same processing of connect PMTA server.
